Vulnerability.Description: [52.3.0-3.0.1] - Add firefox-oracle-default-prefs.js and remove the corresponding Red Hat one - Force requirement of newer gdk-pixbuf2 to ensure a proper update (Todd Vierling) [orabug 19847484] [52.3.0-3] - Fix for rhbz#1470294 - bundling newer libffi for ppc* platforms [52.3.0-2] - Update to 52.3.0 ESR (b2)
Vulnerability.Name: ELSA-2017-2456
